artist: Larsen Design Studio; Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Open weave with a variety of yarns and textures, Vertical stripes form the basic weave pattern, larger horizontal stripes created with bulky chenille in contrasting color. Open weave warp stripes in orange, rust, green, gold, white. Weft: white, metallic gold. One selvedge edge. (white, off-white, yellow, gold metallic, beige, light green, rust)

title: Cornsilk B
